author: Fraser Dominic David
comment: I've been looking for an app that shows me constantly the battery level of my phone/watch while they're charging and notifies me when they're fully charged. There was nothing actually, all I've found was apps that shows only one device. Then I found this. It shows me the battery level of my watch when its charging and vice versa. Very useful if you charge one of your devices far from you. I wonder why this app isn't popular, everyone needs this. Good job dev! I hope you continue working on this. 😊👍👍
title: Just what I need!

author: Michael Rebar
comment: It would be nice if I could change the notification icon color on my phone, tho. The black icon is invisible on my mostly dark themed phone. It just looks like an empty space up there. title: Simple and effective.
